name: Quicksilver
description:
Run across the skyline of the near future - don't let those drones stop you from being radical! Use your super speed and sharp reflexes to run as far as you can.  Pick up power-ups and score combos along the way.

This game was made for Indie Rising Jam #2 - The Theme was Superpower. The Music is made by Jonathan Elihu, and special thanks to SFXR for sound effects.
